document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy and distribution of pimpline parasitoids (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Pimplinae) in Ukraine

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy and distribution of pimpline parasitoids (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Pimplinae) in Ukraine

subSubSection.paragraph: Records. Ukraine ( Kasparyan, 1981 ), Ivano-Frankivsk Region ( Varga, 2017a ).

Rhyacionia buoliana

Distribution. Afrotropical, Oriental and Palaearctic Regs; Ukraine : Crimea , Dnipro, Donetsk , Ivano-Frankivsk , Kherson , Khmelnytskyi , Kropyvnytskyi, Kyiv , Lugansk , Mykolaiv , Odesa , Transcarpathian, Vinnytsya , and Zaporizhzhya Regs.
Biology. CMF, CEMF, CSF, PS. April–October.
